originalTitle: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
title: 'They sent a letter asking to preach. Then they massacred us' - Nigerians on jihadist attack
content: Armed jihadists devastate a community that refused to convert to their hard-line interpretation of Islam.

originalTitle: As US cash dries up South Africa's fight to stop Aids gets harder
title: As US cash dries up South Africa's fight to stop Aids gets harder
content: Health experts fear that as testing and monitoring drops the risk of the further spread of HIV rises.

originalTitle: Fisherman fleeing elephants killed by crocodile in Zambia
title: Fisherman fleeing elephants killed by crocodile in Zambia
content: The fisherman ran into a stream near the river after he and two friends encountered a herd of elephants.

originalTitle: Republicans condemn racist Trump video post depicting Obamas as apes
title: Republicans condemn racist Trump video post depicting Obamas as apes
content: Members of Trump's political party called for the removal of the reposted clip, which has since been taken down.

title: UK police search Mandelson-linked properties as part of Epstein probe
content: Properties in London and Wiltshire searched as police investigate alleged leaks to late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Iranian FM says indirect talks with US were a ‘good start’
content: Iran’s foreign minister said indirect talks with the US were a “good start" despite massive mistrust.

title: Russian general shot several times in Moscow
content: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev is a senior figure in the main directorate of Russia's military general staff.

title: Talks with US set to continue after 'good beginning', Iran's foreign minister says
content: Abbas Aragchi spoke after hours of talks in Oman ended, which the two countries entered with significantly different positions.

originalTitle: More than 30 killed in blast at Pakistan mosque, officials say
title: More than 30 killed in blast at Pakistan mosque, officials say
content: Almost 170 were injured in the explosion, which took place during Friday prayers in the capital Islamabad.

originalTitle: From £70 a week to brink of Premier League record 24 years later
title: From £70 a week to brink of Premier League record 24 years later
content: James Milner will equal the Premier League appearance record if he features for Brighton on Sunday, 24 years after making his debut as a 16-year-old.

originalTitle: 'Football aspect of Liverpool season not so important after Jota'
title: 'Football aspect of Liverpool season not so important after Jota'
content: Former Liverpool goalkeeper Caoimhin Kelleher says performances and results at his old club are not quite as important this season following the death of Diogo Jota.

originalTitle: Why should I not express how I feel? - Guardiola
title: Why should I not express how I feel? - Guardiola
content: Pep Guardiola defended his stance of speaking up about global conflicts by asking, "why should I not express what I feel, just because I am a manager?"
